text: Chisimu Allah jwangantesya soni kupeleka chilandanyo cha njenjema kapena chakupunda pele. Sano aŵala ŵakulupilile niakumanyililaga kuti chilandanyochi chakuonaonape chakuumila kwa M’mbuje gwao, nambo aŵala ŵakanile niakasatiji: “Ana Allah akusaka chichi pa chilandanyo chalakwechi?” (Allah) akwalechelelaga ŵajinji kusokonechela nacho, nambo soni akwajongolaga nacho ŵajinji. Nambotu jwaangaalechelela kusokonechela nacho ikaŵeje ŵakunyosya
